plot: The two lovers are living together and are not married as they hesitantly explain to her brother. They had made a promise as children to get married when they grew up, but they &"didn't wait.&" It's an important plot point as it drives Cooper's actions when he discovers that Crawford and Young are living in sin.   Written by  Brian Black
title: Vivimos hoy
